MajorClaims.MC1: physical exercise is a crucial part of every school day
MajorClaims.MC2: Including physical activity in children's school day should be strongly considered

Claims.C1: Exercise is good not only for having a good health body, but also for the mind
Claims.C2: including exercise in children's daily routine, it is a good way to teach them the importance of physical activity from an early age
Claims.C3: Physical activity helps children to grow up physically healthier
Claims.C4: Daily exercise will help also to develop children's brain function
Claims.C5: Having children in the daily exercise routine from an early age will teach them the important value of having physical activity in their every day routine
Claims.C6: It will meliorate not only mental and body health, but also will establish in children a habit of doing it, giving them the opportunity to measure the worth of including such an important activity in their daily live schedules

Premises.P1: the rate of obesity in children has increased every year, it will be very beneficial for children to have a daily physical activity and get a break from being sitting several hours at school
Premises.P2: exercise will help them to not be less exposed to illness related with cardiovascular, higher blood and cholesterol issues
Premises.P3: It is well known how important it is to exercise regularly to help the body system to work better
Premises.P4: When people exercise, the respiratory system's function is enhanced, helping all organs, including the brain, to get more oxygen in
Premises.P5: Daily exercise will provide children with a mental break which will boost them to be efficient learners
Premises.P6: Children are bombarded with lectures about nutrition and physical activity; however, they will be more beneficed if that knowledge can be put in practice
Premises.P7: they can stick with the routine and make the daily physical activities a good habit on their whole life
